title: Registration Team Member
subtitle: WebSummit Lisbon 2024
description: The first day I assisted with speakers and partners registration, ensuring a smooth check-in process and providing some information about the event. In the second day I was placed on the Analytics & Data Collection team where I helped scanning all people coming into the event.

title: Rowing Summer Camp Coach
subtitle: Clube dos Galitos, Aveiro
description: Responsible for supervising and coaching kids during their morning rowing practice, helping them develop their skills, stay safe, and most importantly, have fun.
